## The **only** mobile release management platform.
With Runway there are no more custom scripts to maintain, checklists to write, Slack commotion to monitor, or existential dread to manage when it’s your turn to run a release. Join thousands of mobile engineers who rely on Runway to handle release coordination and busywork so they can focus on building great apps.
[Try our Sandbox](https://runway.team/<https:/www.runway.team/sb/home>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a8613a5_process_illo_line.svg)
## Manage your entire mobile release cycle from **one place**.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a8612bf_0%20-%20app%20home.jpg)
Runway’s unified mobile release dashboard provides a single source of truth for your whole team.[**TRY OUR SANDBOX »**](https://runway.team/<https:/www.runway.team/sb/home>)

## Runway is built by mobile engineers for mobile engineers (and their teams).
![Single Source illustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861417_secure_illo.svg)
### A true **single source** of truth.
Runway provides visibility into and across your entire release cycle. 
![Release Illustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861418_release_illo.svg)
### **Release** on autopilot
Tasks that used to require hours of tedious tasks now take minutes as your releases just… happen
### **Ship** with confidence.
If anything goes wrong, Runway can catch it and take action before you even know it happened. 
![Ship with confidence](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861419_monitor_illo.svg)
![Keep informed illustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861426_measure_illo1.png)
### Keep everyone **informed.**
You’ll never again have to answer the question “What’s the status of the release?” 
## **Build features** instead of fastlane scripts.
Friends don’t let friends write Ruby. With Runway’s customizable, comprehensive toolset, you can build great apps instead of tinkering with scripting.
[Contact Sales](https://runway.team/</contact>)[Sign up](https://runway.team/<https:/app.runway.team/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a8613b3_left_point.svg)![app icons floating background](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a8613b4_app_icons_img.svg)
## First-class **integrations.**
Runway sits across all the tools in your stack, acting as a control center to run the entire release cycle. Once you connect your toolchain, Runway does the rest, understanding and adapting to your team’s unique, existing workflow.

### 01.
## Automations so thorough, anyone can run a release.
From branch cuts and version bumps to ticket labeling to releases and rollouts — Runway automates away the steady drip of overhead and context‑switching.

### 02.
## **Complete visibility** into every step of the release.
Runway pulls in and intelligently reconciles code, tickets, and builds to give your team a complete picture of the work that’s shipping — or expected to ship — with each and every upcoming release.

### 03.
## **Hassle free** build distribution.
Seamlessly share WIP builds as early and as often as you want, with whomever you want — non-engineers included — using branch-based or dedicated personal buckets for everyone on the team.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a86140c_right_line_process.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a86140d_distribute_bg_img.svg)
“**If we didn’t have Runway, I guess I would quit.** **(Joking!)** But seriously, we’d be back to desperately needing to figure out a way to fix things ourselves. We’d be in trouble.”
![Avatar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861455_sergio.png)
Sergio linares
Senior ANDROID Engineer
![Flink logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861404_flink%201-min.png)
### 04.
## **The full picture** of release health
Monitor the health of a live release, and halt or accelerate rollouts – or even roll back your release – based on stability, user behavior, feedback, and other fully customizable thresholds that you define. Never stress over a rollout again.
![Full picture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861448_hassle.png)

## Mobile releases, **solved.**
Runway frees-up bandwidth for Gusto’s mobile team, and improves collaboration org-wide
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861400_process_linear_line.svg)
Runway has been super, super impactful. It is amazing. My Runway ‘aha’ moment was the day I realized, ‘Oh wow, this release will happen and I don't even have to think about it.
![Avatar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673c92fc0293a3095a860d4c/673c92fc0293a3095a861456_62f3fcd5d64065547ef84c7e_gusto-kamilah.png)

generated_description:
**Runway: Revolutionizing Mobile App Releases**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch W21, Runway is a New York-based startup on a mission: to make mobile app releases easier and more reliable for teams. With a compact team of 18, led by the insightful Aaron Epstein as their Group Partner, Runway is shaking up the mobile release management landscape.

At its core, Runway is a SaaS platform designed specifically for mobile engineering teams. It eliminates the chaotic manual processes often associated with releasing apps. No one wants to sift through endless checklists or wade through Slack channels filled with release commotion. Instead, Runway offers a unified control center that coordinates releases seamlessly.

### Key Features

Runway’s platform boasts several key features, including:

- **Release Management:** A single source of truth for all your releases.
- **End-to-End Automation:** Automate releases to keep teams hands-free.
- **Monitoring Rollouts:** Keep track of your releases while automating the process.
- **Rollbacks:** Quick recovery options if things go south.
- **Hassle-Free Distribution:** Simplified distribution of builds without the usual headaches.
- **Mobile Insights:** Tools to measure your team’s performance effectively.

### Transformative Use Cases

Runway isn’t just a tool; it solves specific pain points. Its functionalities are designed for:

- Teams using Fastlane, enhancing their efficiency.
- Automating release trains, which can save valuable time.
- Integrating Mobile DevOps practices, creating a more collaborative environment.
- Unified dashboards for cross-platform management.

### A Trusted Partner

Companies like DoorDash, monday.com, Mercari, and many others trust Runway. Their software enables teams to release 20% more often than average apps, and recover from mishaps 15% quicker. In essence, they are building great apps instead of sweating over fastlane scripts.

### Why Choose Runway?

Runway simplifies app releases, allowing mobile engineers to focus on creativity and development rather than logistical nightmares. You get visibility into your entire release cycle, monitoring health, stability, and user feedback all from one dashboard. This approach not only frees up bandwidth but fosters collaboration across teams. 

**Join the Future of Mobile Releases**

If your team is ready to break free from antiquated release practices and improve your mobile app processes, Runway presents an all-in-one solution tailored for the modern engineer. Explore Runway for yourself at [Runway Team](https://runway.team). 

**Embrace more reliable releases. Ship faster. Let Runway take care of the chaos.**
